name: Eltor - Demo
description:
QUICK NOTE: If an antivirus like Windows Defender or Norton tries to tell you that the game file is dangerous or anything like that, I can promise you it's safe and you can click "Run Anyway". I'm not entirely sure why this happens to some game files on the Internet or how to prevent it, but as I said, the file is completely safe.

--------------------

Eltor

"The One Above, our Guiding Hand from the stars, the Looming Protector of our now purified souls, watches us...

Watchful Eye, a whisper among voices, the Truth shattering the mirror of lies...  Lies we tell ourselves no more, for now, we know what stays hidden beyond the veil, what mankind was never meant to witness.

Oh, but how fortunate we are! To have learned the Truth, to have gained this knowledge! This town, Eltor, once a town unknown to but a few souls in this land, shall now be known to all! Eltor, where miracles occur! Eltor, where all secrets are unveiled! Eltor, where the Truth is revealed! Eltor, the Sacred Town!

And you, our Protector, shall be watching. Always."

--------------------

Uncover the disturbing past of a mysterious cursed town as you attempt, like many before you, to eradicate the source of its corruption.  Lightly inspired by Bloodborne, Eltor is a dark, atmospheric, and difficult Action RPG-Shooter with a large emphasis on its combat and environmental storytelling.

Of course, this is only a demo. There are many more mechanics, locations, enemy types, and weapons that'll be added in the final game, such as:

  • Shotgun and Crossbow
  • Challenging Bosses
  • Corrupted Souls (Enemy type)
  • Docks, Mansion, and Church
  • Creepier and more disturbing elements

--------------------
